message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) - This paper proposes a real-time system for the recognition of surgical tools during surgery using a convolutional neural network (CNN). Therefore, it is highly likely to belong to the Computer Vision sub-category. 
2. cs.RO (Robotics) - The proposed system can be used to simplify surgical procedures for the surgeon, which is a crucial aspect of robotics in surgery. 
3. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The use of smart glasses to display information about surgical tools during surgery can be considered as a multimedia application. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The proposed system uses deep neural networks for surgical tool recognition, which falls under the Machine Learning sub-category. 
5. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The use of deep neural networks for surgical tool recognition can also be considered as an application of Artificial Intelligence.
